txt.en:
'Mae govannen. Have you seen these weeds around Edhellond?' Breniriel holds up a fistful of what appears to be a bristly plant. 'I have studied many native plants, and not once have I ever seen one similar to this. Neither animal nor pest will eat the weeds, and they steal the resources that our garden requires. Doubtless the seeds accompanied the Corsairs on their long voyage here.

'If Cellineth's new flowers are to thrive, then I must uproot every weed here.

'Will you help me?'
Traces of the Corsairs' occupation of Edhellond persist in the form of an invasive plant.
Breniriel has asked you to pull any invasive weeds you find in Edhellond.
You have pulled all the weeds you could find.\n\nYou should talk to Breniriel in Edhellond.

'Now Cellineth's flowers have a better chance at survival. That is more than enough for me.' 

Breniriel offers a faint smile. 

'Thank you.'
